title: [Large-Scale] Industrial Heritage Education: Pre-Service Teacher Training Using Digital Storytelling

context.prior_knowledge: Basic secondary social studies knowledge and foundational understanding of instructional design as an educator
context.additional_context: Prospective teachers understand the historical and social value of industrial heritage and acquire educational methods utilizing digital storytelling techniques.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the definition and social significance of industrial heritage.
Learners can understand the digital storytelling-based animation production process and create design blueprints.
Learners can develop lesson plans integrating industrial heritage educational content into elementary social studies curricula.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
